info.title: IOFinNet API
info.description:
IOFinNet platform API for financial automation. The platform leverages cryptography, blockchain, multi-party computation, and distributed systems to revolutionize conventional finance. Services include:

- **io.vault**: MPC TSS institutional digital asset self-custody solution
- **io.network**: Always-on settlement platform for instant transactions

Extracted from https://docs.iofinnet.com/reference/core-introduction

post.description: Fetches an access token using client credentials (OAuth)

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all vaults accessible to the user. Each vault represents a secure storage space for managing digital assets and creating signatures.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor after which to start returning results

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Cursor before which to start returning results

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific vault by its ID

parameters.name: vaultId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the vault to retrieve

get.description: Retrieves a list of all assets visible in a specific vault, including their balances and receiving addresses
Retrieves a paginated list of transactions for a specific asset in a vault

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor after which to start returning results

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Cursor before which to start returning results

post.description: Create a native asset transfer and broadcast it to chain
Create a token transfer and broadcast it to chain
Sign and broadcast a transaction

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all signature requests for a specific vault. Each signature request represents a pending or completed cryptographic signature operation.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor after which to start returning results

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Cursor before which to start returning results

post.description: Creates a new signature request for cryptographic signing. The request will require approval from vault signers based on their configured weights.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific signature request

parameters.name: signatureId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the signature request

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all entries in the io.network directory. The directory contains information about registered users and organisations in the io.network ecosystem. You can search for entries by display name or address.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search for directory entry by display name or address

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor after which to start returning results

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Cursor before which to start returning results

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific directory entry by address

post.description: Creates a new transfer request for io.network assets. Note: This endpoint requires an io.network subscription. This endpoint initiates a transfer of io.network assets from the vault to a specified address. The receiving address must be an address that is registered in the io.network directory.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific network transfer

Retrieves a paginated list of all io.network transactions for a specific vault. This endpoint returns a history of all completed io.network transactions, including transfers between io.network addresses, minting and burning operations, and transaction status and details. Note: This endpoint requires an io.network subscription.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor after which to start returning results

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Cursor before which to start returning results

clientId.description: Client ID obtained from IO account

clientSecret.description: Client secret obtained from IO account

publicKey.description: Public key address for receiving the asset

contractAddress.description: Contract address of the asset. For native assets, this will be the native token symbol (e.g., 'ETH' for Ethereum). For ERC20/TRC20 tokens, this will be the actual contract address.

balance.description: Current balance of the asset in the vault

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp when the vault was created

updatedAt.description: ISO timestamp when the vault was last updated

startCursor.description: Cursor of the first result in the current page

endCursor.description: Cursor of the last result in the current page

hasNextPage.description: Indicates if there are more results after the current page

hasPreviousPage.description: Indicates if there are more results before the current page

data.description: Unsigned data to be signed (format depends on contentType)

coseAlgorithm.description: The COSE algorithm to use for signing

contentType.description: The content type of the data

source.description: Source of the signature request (visible in UI)

expiresAt.description: Optional expiration time for the request

mutable.description: Whether the tag can be modified

isError.description: Whether this tag indicates an error

vote.description: Current vote status. null for new requests

contentType.description: The content type of the data

id.description: Unique identifier of the signature request

signatureId.description: Unique identifier of the signature request (same as id)

errorCode.description: Error code if the request failed

errorMessage.description: Detailed error message if the request failed

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp when the request was created

updatedAt.description: ISO timestamp when the request was last updated

expiresAt.description: ISO timestamp when the request expires

tags.description: Tags associated with the signature request

id.description: Unique identifier of the signature request

status.description: Current status of the signature request

errorCode.description: Error code if the request failed

errorMessage.description: Detailed error message if the request failed

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp when the request was created

updatedAt.description: ISO timestamp when the request was last updated

expiresAt.description: ISO timestamp when the request expires

errorCode.description: Error code if the transaction failed

errorMessage.description: Detailed error message if the transaction failed

memo.description: A free-form text field for additional information

expiresAt.description: Expiration time for the transfer request

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp when the transfer was created

updatedAt.description: ISO timestamp when the transfer was last updated

expiresAt.description: ISO timestamp when the transfer expires
Expiration time for the transfer request

amount.description: Amount to send with the transaction

expiresAt.description: Expiration time for the transaction request

id.description: Unique identifier of the directory entry
Unique identifier of the transfer request

signatureId.description: Unique identifier of the signature request

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp when the request was created

updatedAt.description: ISO timestamp when the request was last updated

expiresAt.description: ISO timestamp when the request expires

amount.description: Amount to transfer in token units

expiresAt.description: Optional expiration time for the request

signatureId.description: Unique identifier of the signature request

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp when the request was created

updatedAt.description: ISO timestamp when the request was last updated

expiresAt.description: ISO timestamp when the request expires

status.description: Transaction status (only completed transactions are returned)

memo.description: Optional memo given to the transaction

transactionHash.description: The hash of the transaction on the blockchain

entryType.description: Whether the transaction is a debit or credit

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp when the transaction was created

updatedAt.description: ISO timestamp when the transaction was last updated

id.description: Unique identifier of the execution log

error.description: Error message if the execution failed

errorCause.description: Cause of the error if the execution failed

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the execution log was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the execution log was last updated

hasNextPage.description: Whether there are more logs after the current page

hasPreviousPage.description: Whether there are more logs before the current page

previousCursor.description: Cursor for the previous page of results

CreatePostTransactionRuleRequest.description: Request body for creating a post transaction rule. Specific fields depend on rule type.

data.description: Array of post transaction rule objects

hasNextPage.description: Whether there are more rules after the current page

hasPreviousPage.description: Whether there are more rules before the current page

nextCursor.description: Cursor for the next page of results

previousCursor.description: Cursor for the previous page of results

rule.description: Rule object to update. Specific fields depend on rule type.

valid.description: Whether the address is valid for the specified chain and ecosystem

derivationPath.description: Optional derivation path for the address

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the address was last updated

tokens.description: List of tokens associated with this address

hasNextPage.description: Indicates if there are more results after the current page

hasPreviousPage.description: Indicates if there are more results before the current page

startCursor.description: Cursor of the first result in the current page

endCursor.description: Cursor of the last result in the current page

indexFrom.description: Starting index for HD address generation

indexTo.description: Ending index for HD address generation

removeFromHiddenAssets.description: Array of asset identifiers to remove from the hidden assets list

addToHiddenAssets.description: Asset identifiers that were added to the hidden assets list

removeFromHiddenAssets.description: Asset identifiers that were removed from the hidden assets list

symbol.description: The symbol of the native asset

name.description: The name of the native asset

usdValue.description: The USD value of the balance

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp of when the balance was last updated

decimals.description: The number of decimals for the token

usdValue.description: The USD value of the token balance

alias.description: Chain alias used in API requests

ecosystem.description: Blockchain ecosystem the chain belongs to

nativeCurrency.description: Information about the chain's native currency

rpcUrls.description: RPC endpoint URLs for the chain

blockExplorers.description: Block explorer URLs for the chain

marshalledHex.description: Marshalled hex representation of the transaction

broadcast.description: Whether to broadcast the transaction after signing

id.description: Unique identifier of the created transaction

options.description: List of options for desired output: simulation, validation, gas_estimation, events

block.description: Block for validation: 'latest', block number, or block hash

simulate_with_estimated_gas.description: Simulate with gas estimation (requires gas_estimation option)

account_address.description: Address to relate the transaction to for simulation and validation perspective

action.description: The action Blockaid determined for the transaction

reason.description: Reason for the action, if any

balanceChanges.description: List of balance changes for involved addresses

gasPrice.description: Gas price used in the simulation

fee.description: Transaction fee calculated in the simulation

options.description: List of options to include in the response

method.description: The RPC method used by the dApp to propose the transaction

error.description: Error message if the simulation or validation failed

accountAddress.description: Account address associated with the transaction

transfers.description: Array of transfers in the transaction

rawTransactionData.description: Raw transaction data from the blockchain
